name: Phantom Rogue
description:
Phantom Rogue is a short Rouge-like game where you play as a ghost and fight through rooms filled with enemies,toxic lakes,flames and much more.Each powers you will get will grant you more ways to fight as you'll be encountering many challenges in your little adventure.

This game was made in 10 days.

Game made by:Loxmer Larson

Sound designs by:LeshySfmaker

music done in:Groovepad

It is heavily suggested you do the combat room by room otherwise there might be possible bugs.

Press esc to pause the game.

There are 4 weapons in the game,the bosses are immune to the saw weapon.

a lil launch patch:

-Fixed a bug where the before boss level spawned a lot of enemies that lagged the game.
